Player History
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Toronto to Texas on 7/31/1985 (Going to TEX: RF Glenallen Hill. Going to TOR: DH Harold Baines)...
Injured on 7/7/1987 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/11/1992, off Mark Gubicza (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1992, off Andy Benes (DET)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1992, hitting .199 with 20 HR, 69 RBI...
